mainTask.title: HT-011: DCT Micro-Apps Full Branding & White-Label System Implementation
mainTask.description:
**CRITICAL BRANDING TRANSFORMATION** - Complete implementation of full branding and white-label capabilities for DCT Micro-Apps Template-Driven Modular Factory. This task transforms the current mono-theme, brandless system into a fully versatile, client-brandable platform that supports any color scheme, typography, logos, and brand identity.

**OBJECTIVE:** Eliminate all branding limitations and mono-theme restrictions to enable complete client customization and white-labeling capabilities as required by the PRD.

**CRITICAL ISSUES IDENTIFIED:**
- Mono-theme restrictions (single primary color + neutral grays only)
- Hardcoded brand elements ("Your Organization", "Micro App Template", "CH" initials)
- Limited color system (only primary + neutral + optional accent)
- Typography restrictions (fixed to system-ui/Geist fonts only)
- Design Guardian blocking custom branding implementation
- No dynamic logo/brand name system
- No tenant-specific branding configuration
- No brand preset system for quick client onboarding

**PRD REQUIREMENTS:**
- "Consistent patterns and neutral theming so the apps can be quickly white‑labeled"
- "Template-driven, modular factory for delivering small, high-value web apps"
- "Business-friendly delivery: single-payment builds, optional care plans"
- "Commercial addon marketplace (cheap → premium) so features can be composed to match client budgets"
- "Tenant & user model (single client instance per deployment)"
- "Lightweight auth & access control (low friction for end users; admin accounts for management)"
- "Configurable public landing/collection page (lead capture)"
- "Admin UI: module manager, system health, logs, and simple analytics"

**METHODOLOGY:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY
**SCOPE:** Complete branding system transformation across 4 major phases
**ESTIMATED HOURS:** 80+ hours across 4 phases
**DELIVERABLE:** Fully brandable, white-label-ready micro-app factory

**CRITICAL SUCCESS FACTORS:**
- Complete color system supporting any brand palette
- Dynamic logo and brand name system
- Custom typography support for client fonts
- Tenant-specific branding configuration
- Brand preset system for rapid onboarding
- Design Guardian updates for brand-aware validation
- Component system fully themeable and brandable
- Configuration system supporting client-specific branding

**STATUS:** COMPLETED
**PRIORITY:** CRITICAL

subtasks.title: HT-011.1: Core Branding Infrastructure Implementation
subtasks.description:
**PHASE 1 - CORE BRANDING INFRASTRUCTURE**

Implementation of the foundational branding infrastructure that enables complete client customization. This phase establishes the core systems for color management, typography support, logo handling, and brand configuration.

**SCOPE:**
- Expand color system to support full brand customization
- Implement custom typography system with client font support
- Create dynamic logo and brand name system
- Design tenant-specific branding configuration
- Implement brand preset system
- Create brand validation and compliance system

**CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- Support for any brand color palette (primary, secondary, tertiary, custom scales)
- Automatic dark/light mode variants for all brand colors
- Custom font family support per tenant
- Dynamic logo upload and management
- Brand name configuration system
- Brand preset templates for common industries
- Brand validation to ensure accessibility and usability

**DELIVERABLES:**
- Expanded color system with full brand palette support
- Custom typography system with client font integration
- Dynamic logo and brand name management system
- Tenant branding configuration database schema
- Brand preset system with industry templates
- Brand validation and compliance framework

phase_objectives: Expand color system to support any brand palette
Implement custom typography system with client fonts
Create dynamic logo and brand name system
key_areas: Design tokens expansion for multi-brand support
Color palette generation from single brand color
Typography system with custom font loading

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.1: Expand Color System for Full Brand Customization
subtasks.description: Transform the current mono-theme color system into a comprehensive multi-brand color system that supports any client color palette with automatic dark/light variants.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.2: Implement Custom Typography System
subtasks.description: Create a flexible typography system that supports custom client fonts, font weights, and typography scales while maintaining design consistency.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.3: Create Dynamic Logo and Brand Name System
subtasks.description: Implement a dynamic logo upload and management system with brand name configuration that replaces all hardcoded brand elements.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.4: Design Tenant Branding Configuration Schema
subtasks.description: Create database schema and configuration system for tenant-specific branding storage and management.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.5: Implement Brand Preset System
subtasks.description: Create brand preset system with industry-specific templates for rapid client onboarding and brand setup.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.6: Create Brand Validation Framework
subtasks.description: Implement brand validation system to ensure accessibility, usability, and design consistency across all brand customizations.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.7: Implement Brand Import/Export System
subtasks.description: Create brand import/export functionality for easy brand configuration sharing and backup/restore capabilities.

subtasks.title: HT-011.1.8: Design Brand Preview and Testing System
subtasks.description: Create brand preview system for testing brand customizations before applying to production environments.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2: Configuration & Override System Enhancement
subtasks.description:
**PHASE 2 - CONFIGURATION & OVERRIDE SYSTEM ENHANCEMENT**

Enhancement of the configuration and override system to support client-specific branding with runtime brand switching, brand inheritance, and advanced configuration management.

**SCOPE:**
- Enhance configuration system for client-specific branding
- Implement runtime brand switching capabilities
- Create brand inheritance and override system
- Design brand configuration UI
- Implement brand configuration API
- Create brand migration system

**CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- Runtime brand switching without application restart
- Brand inheritance from presets with client overrides
- Brand configuration UI for non-technical users
- Brand configuration API for programmatic access
- Brand migration system for existing deployments
- Brand configuration validation and error handling

**DELIVERABLES:**
- Enhanced configuration system with brand support
- Runtime brand switching implementation
- Brand inheritance and override system
- Brand configuration user interface
- Brand configuration API endpoints
- Brand migration and upgrade system

phase_objectives: Enhance configuration system for brand support
Create brand inheritance and override system
key_areas: Brand override system for client customizations
Brand configuration validation and error handling

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.1: Enhance Configuration System for Brand Support
subtasks.description: Enhance the existing configuration system to support client-specific branding with proper type safety and validation.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.2: Implement Runtime Brand Switching
subtasks.description: Create runtime brand switching capabilities that allow changing brand configurations without application restart.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.3: Create Brand Inheritance and Override System
subtasks.description: Implement brand inheritance system where clients can inherit from presets and override specific brand elements.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.4: Design Brand Configuration User Interface
subtasks.description: Create user-friendly brand configuration interface for non-technical users to customize their brand settings.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.5: Implement Brand Configuration API
subtasks.description: Create RESTful API endpoints for programmatic brand configuration management and integration.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.6: Create Brand Migration System
subtasks.description: Implement brand migration system for upgrading existing deployments to support the new branding capabilities.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.7: Implement Brand Configuration Validation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive brand configuration validation with error handling and user feedback.

subtasks.title: HT-011.2.8: Create Brand Configuration Documentation
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for brand configuration system usage and best practices.

subtasks.title: HT-011.3: Component & UI System Updates
subtasks.description:
**PHASE 3 - COMPONENT & UI SYSTEM UPDATES**

Comprehensive updates to the component and UI system to support full brand customization, including component theming, brand-aware styling, and dynamic brand element integration.

**SCOPE:**
- Update all components to support brand customization
- Implement brand-aware styling system
- Create dynamic brand element integration
- Update navigation and header components
- Implement brand-specific email templates
- Create brand-aware error handling
- Update admin UI for brand management
- Implement brand-aware analytics

**CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- All components support full brand customization
- Brand-aware styling that adapts to client brand
- Dynamic brand elements (logo, name, colors) throughout UI
- Brand-specific email templates and communications
- Brand-aware error messages and notifications
- Admin UI for brand management and configuration
- Brand-aware analytics and reporting

**DELIVERABLES:**
- Updated component library with full brand support
- Brand-aware styling system implementation
- Dynamic brand element integration
- Updated navigation and header components
- Brand-specific email template system
- Brand-aware error handling system
- Brand management admin interface
- Brand-aware analytics implementation

phase_objectives: Update all components for brand customization

subtasks.title: HT-011.4: Design Guardian & Validation Updates
subtasks.description:
**PHASE 4 - DESIGN GUARDIAN & VALIDATION UPDATES**

Updates to the Design Guardian system to support brand-aware validation, configurable design rules, and brand compliance checking while maintaining design consistency and quality.

**SCOPE:**
- Update Design Guardian for brand-aware validation
- Implement configurable design rules per tenant
- Create brand compliance checking system
- Update ESLint rules for brand support
- Implement brand-specific design policies
- Create brand validation testing
- Update design documentation
- Implement brand quality assurance

**CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:**
- Design Guardian supports brand-aware validation
- Configurable design rules per tenant/brand
- Brand compliance checking for accessibility and usability
- ESLint rules updated to support brand customization
- Brand-specific design policies and guidelines
- Comprehensive brand validation testing
- Updated design documentation for branding
- Brand quality assurance and consistency checking

**DELIVERABLES:**
- Updated Design Guardian with brand support
- Configurable design rules system
- Brand compliance checking framework
- Updated ESLint configuration
- Brand-specific design policies
- Brand validation testing suite
- Updated design documentation
- Brand quality assurance system

phase_objectives: Update Design Guardian for brand support

phase_1.focus: Core branding infrastructure and foundational systems

technical_risks: Brand customization may impact performance if not optimized
Dynamic brand switching could cause UI flicker or loading issues
Custom font loading may impact page load times
Brand validation complexity may slow down development workflow
mitigation_strategies: Implement efficient brand caching and optimization strategies
Use smooth transitions and loading states for brand switching
Optimize font loading with preloading and fallback strategies
Create efficient brand validation with caching and async processing

success_criteria.phase_1: Complete color system supporting any brand palette with automatic dark/light variants
success_criteria.phase_2: Runtime brand switching working seamlessly without application restart
success_criteria.phase_3: All components fully customizable with brand-aware styling
success_criteria.phase_4: Design Guardian supporting brand-aware validation with configurable rules
